_header: Madame ye been of all beauty shrine
Subjects: women, praise of; women, virtues of; lovers, praise of beloved; lovers’ plea
_description: A Balade to Rosamond, by Chaucer — twenty-four lines, with refrain, ‘Thogh ye to me ne do no daliaunce’

BodRawPoe163.First Lines:
Madame ye ben of al beaute shryneAs fer as cereled is the
                    mapamonde…
BodRawPoe163.Last Lines:
…Do what you list I wyl your thral be soundeThough ye to me ne
                    do no daliance
